plot: A fresh police leak enables another audacious raid, while Arnott's attempts to gather information put him in a dangerous situation.

Lisa McQueen blags her way past a police guard and Cafferty's husband to talk to her in private. Another police leak enables the OCG to carry out a raid led by Corbett on a weapons convoy. Arnott finds Cafferty with £5,000 in a brown envelope in his attempts to gather information, yet Corbett convinces him he is "straight". Hastings is approached regarding his failed property investment by Mark Moffatt, who hands him a big brown envelope. Hastings's wife Roisin insists on a divorce. From photographs, Cafferty identifies who recruited her.—KGF Vissers
